import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { Dialog, Transition } from '@headlessui/react' import InputText from '../../components/inputText' import api from '../../util/api' export default function AddCategoryModal({open, setOpen, setCategories}) { const [name, setName] = useState("") const [error, setError] = useState(null) const handleSubmit = (evt) => { evt.preventDefault() createCategory() alert("Successfully added category.") setOpen(false) } function createCategory() { api.createCategory({ name: name, guides: [], }) .then((response) => { setCategories(response.data) }) .catch(error => setError(error)) } function validateForm() { return name !== '' } return (
{/* This element is to trick the browser into centering the modal contents. */} {/* ​ */}
Create category
setName(e.target.value)} />
) }
